nl.inl.util

Class ThreadPauserImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.util.ThreadPauserImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pausible, ThreadPauser

    public class ThreadPauserImpl
extends Object
implements ThreadPauser
    Allows us to pause the thread. The thread must cooperate by calling waitIfPaused() regularly. We don't use Java's own thread priority system because it's not particularly portable / practical to use (differences in priority between OS'es, needs root on Linux, etc.)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long currentPauseLength()
      How long has this job been paused for currently? This does not include any previous pauses.

      How long has this job been running currently? This does not include any previous running phases.
      boolean isPaused()
      Is this operation currently paused?
      void pause(boolean paused)
      Pause or unpause this operation.
      long pausedTotal()
      How long has this job been paused in total?
      static void setEnabled(boolean enabled) 
      void waitIfPaused()
      If the thread we're controlling is supposed to be paused, wait until it is unpaused or it's interrupted.

      • waitIfPaused

        public void waitIfPaused()
                  throws InterruptedException
        Description copied from interface: ThreadPauser
        If the thread we're controlling is supposed to be paused, wait until it is unpaused or it's interrupted.
        Specified by:
        waitIfPaused in interface ThreadPauser
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if thread was interrupted from elsewhere (e.g. load manager)

      • pause

        public void pause(boolean paused)
        Description copied from interface: Pausible
        Pause or unpause this operation. This can be used to stop a heavy search from consuming CPU resources when other users are waiting. Pausing actually amounts to "proceeding very slowly".
        Specified by:
        pause in interface Pausible
        Specified by:
        pause in interface ThreadPauser
        Parameters:
        paused - if true, pause the operation; if false, unpause it

        Description copied from interface: Pausible
        Is this operation currently paused?
        Specified by:
        isPaused in interface Pausible
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        true if operation is paused, false if not

      • currentPauseLength

        public long currentPauseLength()
        Description copied from interface: ThreadPauser
        How long has this job been paused for currently? This does not include any previous pauses.
        Specified by:
        currentPauseLength in interface ThreadPauser
        Returns:
        number of ms since the job was paused, or 0 if not paused

      • currentRunPhaseLength

        public long currentRunPhaseLength()
        Description copied from interface: ThreadPauser
        How long has this job been running currently? This does not include any previous running phases.
        Specified by:
        currentRunPhaseLength in interface ThreadPauser
        Returns:
        number of ms since the job was set to running, or 0 if not running

      • pausedTotal

        Description copied from interface: ThreadPauser
        How long has this job been paused in total?
        Specified by:
        pausedTotal in interface ThreadPauser
        Returns:
